mapper.insert: insert into user (id, email, password, intro, nickname, name) values (#{id}, #{email}, #{password}, #{intro}, #{nickname}, #{name});
mapper.delete: delete from follow where followerId = #{followerId} and followedId = #{followedId};
mapper.select: SELECT id, password, email, intro, nickname, name, tier, followerCnt, followingCnt, createdAt, profilePicSrc, profilePicName, emailConfirmation FROM user INNER JOIN follow ON follow.followedId=user.id WHERE user.id = #{id} AND follow.accepted=1
